response.overview: "Warriors" tells the untold story of the 2009 Davidson High School football team, a powerhouse public program chasing an Alabama state title, that featured NFL stars Jimmie Ward and Jaquiski Tartt, the first high school duo drafted by the same NFL team.  Set against the vibrant backdrop of Friday night football in the deep South, "Warriors" intertwines the athletic achievements of the 2009 season with the personal stories of several key players and coaches.
response.title: Warriors
